page.title: 10SPILSBY MAYDAY CELEBRATIONS
page.content: Monday 6th of May was Mayday.Everyone was excited.There where many floats. I was one of the May Queen's attendants.We wore long dresses and a crown of flowers.We also rode in a horse drawn cart. There were floats for the Save the Children Fund and Postmen Through the Ages.The floats were judged to see who was the best. There were majoretts.The streets were crowded with people watching the carnival.The carnival went round the outskirts of Spilsby towncentre.When we got of the floats we went round Spilsby.I went with Hannah and Rebekah my friends.We went to the park for a while.Then we went to see Prince the horse.I gave him some carrots to eat.After that my Dad came and took me home.
